channel.title: Nix, on IronShark
channel.description: Recent content in Nix, on IronShark

item.title: One File System Configuration with NixOS and Emacs Org-Mode
item.description: Introduction This article describes my attempts to create a set of https://leanpub.com/lit-config/read. With each file containing all the settings and customizations I use for a machine in a single location.
